work.name: Vedic Info Systems
work.summary: Developed deep learning pipelines using U-Net and CNNs for real-time aneurysm detection from echocardiographic data. Collaborated with cross-functional teams including medical experts.

work.name: The Sparks Foundation
work.position: Data Scientist and Business Analyst Intern
work.summary: Analyzed exam data and predicted performance using regression models.
highlights: Achieved 90% accuracy in academic performance forecasting

work.name: The Wings of Desire
work.summary: Designed the organization's website and created digital assets for outreach campaigns.

awards.title: Best Paper Presentation Award
awards.summary: Awarded for presentation of a deep learning-based face mask detection system.

awards.title: International Scholarship Award
awards.summary: Awarded for master's degree program in Data Analytics.

volunteer.summary: Mentored international students and organized orientation events.
Led awareness camps and educational outreach for underprivileged students.
